duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide leadership in the coordination and delivery of quality compassionate patient care.
Utilize the nursing process of assessment, planning, implementation, and evaluation to provide, delegate, supervise, and document care and teaching of patients and family.
Effectively communicate pertinent patient/family information to health care team.
Participate in finding solutions for variances from patient goals and ensure implementation of solutions.

education_certification.credential: Graduation from an accredited school of nursing.
Enrollment in a Bachelor of Science in Nursing (BSN) program within 3 years of hire.
Completion of a Bachelor of Science in Nursing (BSN) within 5 years of hire.
Current licensure by the Michigan State Board of Nursing.
Bachelor of Science in Nursing (BSN) preferred.
Professional Certifications to support a culture of nursing excellence preferred.
